mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_NNAME, USER_ROLE, USER_PHONE, USER_EMAIL, USER_ADDRESS, USER_GENRE, USER_AGREEMENT, USER_ENROLL_DATE, USER_MODIFY_DATE, STATUS ) VALUES( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userNname}, DEFAULT, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail}, #{userAddress}, #{userGenre}, #{userAgreement}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, DEFAULT )
